mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_INFO ( REVIEW_SEQ_NO, TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENTS, REG_DT, CHG_DT, REVIEW_NAME, USER_ID ) VALUES ( MEM_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{reviewContents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{reviewName}, #{userId} )

INSERT INTO FILE_INFO ( FILE_SEQ, BRD_SEQ_NO, USER_NO, ORI_NAME, CHG_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, EXTENSION, REG_DT, BRD_KIND ) VALUES ( FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MAX(REVIEW_SEQ_NO) FROM REVIEW_INFO), #{userNo}, #{oriName}, #{chgName}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{extension}, SYSDATE, #{brdKind} )
mapper.select: SELECT RI.REVIEW_SEQ_NO as reviewSeqNo, RI.TITLE as title, RI.REVIEW_CONTENTS as reviewContents, RI.REG_DT as regDt, RI.CHG_DT as chgDt, RI.REVIEW_NAME as reviewName, RI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM REVIEW_INFO RI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON RI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE RI.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT RI.REVIEW_SEQ_NO as reviewSeqNo, RI.TITLE as title, RI.REVIEW_CONTENTS as reviewContents, RI.REG_DT as regDt, RI.CHG_DT as chgDt, RI.REVIEW_NAME as reviewName, RI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName, FI.CHG_NAME as chgName, FI.FILE_SEQ as fileSeq FROM REVIEW_INFO RI, FILE_INFO FI, USER_INFO UI WHERE RI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID AND RI.REVIEW_SEQ_NO = #{reviewSeqNo} AND RI.REVIEW_SEQ_NO = FI.BRD_SEQ_NO AND FI.BRD_KIND = 'review'

SELECT RI.REVIEW_SEQ_NO as reviewSeqNo, RI.TITLE as title, RI.REVIEW_CONTENTS as reviewContents, RI.REG_DT as regDt, RI.CHG_DT as chgDt, RI.REVIEW_NAME as reviewName, RI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM REVIEW_INFO RI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON RI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID

SELECT RI.REVIEW_SEQ_NO as reviewSeqNo, RI.TITLE as title, RI.REVIEW_CONTENTS as reviewContents, RI.REG_DT as regDt, RI.CHG_DT as chgDt, RI.REVIEW_NAME as reviewName, RI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM REVIEW_INFO RI, USER_INFO UI WHERE RI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID AND RI.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND RI.REVIEW_SEQ_NO LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND RI.REVIEW_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND RI.USER_ID '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT RI.REVIEW_SEQ_NO as reviewSeqNo, RI.TITLE as title, RI.REVIEW_CONTENTS as reviewContents, RI.REG_DT as regDt, RI.CHG_DT as chgDt, RI.REVIEW_NAME as reviewName, RI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName, FI.CHG_NAME as chgName, FI.FILE_SEQ as fileSeq FROM REVIEW_INFO RI, FILE_INFO FI, USER_INFO UI WHERE RI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID AND RI.REVIEW_SEQ_NO = #{reviewSeqNo} AND RI.REVIEW_SEQ_NO = FI.BRD_SEQ_NO AND FI.BRD_KIND = 'review'
